code: export const isRequired=input=>{return input?true:false;};export const isValidMaxlength=(input,maximumLength)=>{if(input&&input.length>maximumLength){return false;}return true;};export const isValidEmail=input=>{return /\S+@\S+\.\S+/.test(input);};export const isValidPhoneNumber=input=>{return /^\[\d{3}\]-\d{3}-\d{4}$/.test(input);};
